name: saucedemo-automation
description: SauceDemo E-commerce automation with Playwright and TypeScript

scripts.test:videos: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:video-users: npm run clean && npx playwright test src/tests/standard-user-video.spec.ts src/tests/problem-user-video.spec.ts src/tests/locked-user-video.spec.ts src/tests/error-user-video.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:purchase-flows: npm run clean && npx playwright test src/tests/purchaseFlow.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run clean && npx playwright test
scripts.test:clean: npm run clean && npx playwright test --reporter=html
scripts.test:fresh: npm run clean && npx playwright test
scripts.test:with-reports: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium && npm run generate-reports
scripts.test:with-logs: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium 2>&1 | tee test-results/logs/console-output.log
scripts.report:custom: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const files=fs.readdirSync('test-results/reports').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.html'));if(files.length>0){console.log('Opening:',files[0]);require('child_process').execSync('open test-results/reports/'+files[0]);}else{console.log('No custom reports found. Run test:with-reports first.')}"
scripts.view-logs: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const logsDir=path.join(process.cwd(),'test-results','logs');if(fs.existsSync(logsDir)){const files=fs.readdirSync(logsDir);console.log('Log files available:');files.forEach(file=>console.log('- '+file));}else{console.log('No log files found. Run tests first.');}"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf test-results playwright-report screenshots node_modules package-lock.json
